summary: The Boston Red Sox are a professional baseball team in the American League's East Division. They were founded in 1901 and have won nine World Series titles, with their most recent win in 2018. The team plays at Fenway Park, and their name comes from earlier teams called the "Boston Red Stockings." The Red Sox had a famous 86-year championship drought, known as the "Curse of the Bambino," which ended in 2004. They have a fierce rivalry with the New York Yankees. The team is owned by Fenway Sports Group and has a strong fan base, known for singing "Sweet Caroline" during games.
title: Boston Red Sox
